# dbt_cloud_job (Data Source)


## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "dbt_cloud_job" "test" {
  project_id     = 101
  environment_id = 1
  job_id         = 1
  execute_steps  = [
    "dbt run",
    "dbt test"
  ]
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- **project_id** (Integer)
- **environment_id** (Integer)
- **job_id** (Integer)
- **execute_steps** (List of Strings)

### Read-Only
- **name** (String)
